mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_BRAND, NORMAL_PRICE, SALE_PRICE, DISCOUNT, MAIN_IMG FROM PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY SCRAP_COUNT DESC, PRODUCT_NO DESC LIMIT 4
SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_BRAND, NORMAL_PRICE, SALE_PRICE, DISCOUNT, MAIN_IMG FROM PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PRODUCT_DATE DESC, PRODUCT_NO DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, CATEGORY, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_BRAND, NORMAL_PRICE, SALE_PRICE, DISCOUNT, MAIN_IMG, DESCRIPTION, SHIPMENT_TYPE, SHIPMENT_TIME, SHIPPING_PRICE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
AND (PRODUCT_NAME ILIKE '%' || #{content} || '%' OR PRODUCT_BRAND ILIKE '%' || #{content} || '%' OR CATEGORY ILIKE '%' || #{content} || '%')
AND CATEGORY LIKE '야채'
AND CATEGORY LIKE '과일'
AND CATEGORY LIKE '어류'
AND CATEGORY LIKE '육류'
AND CATEGORY LIKE '빵'
AND CATEGORY LIKE '면'
AND CATEGORY LIKE '유제품'
ORDER BY PRODUCT_DATE DESC, PRODUCT_NO DESC
ORDER BY PRODUCT_VIEW DESC, PRODUCT_NO DESC
ORDER BY SCRAP_COUNT DESC, PRODUCT_NO DESC
)

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_BRAND, NORMAL_PRICE, SALE_PRICE, DISCOUNT, MAIN_IMG FROM PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
AND (PRODUCT_NAME ILIKE '%' || #{content} || '%' OR PRODUCT_BRAND ILIKE '%' || #{content} || '%' OR CATEGORY ILIKE '%' || #{content} || '%')

mapper.select: select q.qna_no, q.qna_content, q.qna_create_date, q.qna_answer_type, q.qna_photo, q.ref_qna_no, q.product_no, q.pdopt_no, q.member_no, member_nickname as "writerNickname", member_profile as "writerProfile", a.qna_no as "answerNo", a.qna_content as "answerContent", a.qna_create_date as "answerCreateDate" FROM QNA q JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN QNA a ON q.qna_no = a.ref_qna_no LEFT JOIN OPTION_NAME ON q.pdopt_no = options_name_no WHERE q.product_no = #{productNo} and q.qna_type = 1 and q.status = 'Y' ORDER BY qna_create_date ASC

select o.options_name_no, o.options_name, o.main_option, o.options_normal_price, o.options_sale_price, o.options_stock, o.product_no, p.seller, p.product_name, p.product_brand, p.main_img, p.shipment_type from option_name o left join product p on (o.product_no = p.product_no) where o.product_no = #{productNo} and o.status = 'Y'
